title: Community Associates Joint Program—Lecture and Tours Only: The Rise of Photography and a Season of Art Institute Exhibitions
hero_caption: Gustave Caillebotte. Paris Street; Rainy Day, 1877. Charles H. and Mary F. S. Worcester Collection.
short_description: Register for the Community Associates Joint Program without transportation or lunch.
list_description: Register for the Community Associates Joint Program without transportation or lunch.
description:
Explore a variety of special exhibitions at the Art Institute, as Giovanni Aloi kicks off the event with his lecture, "The Photographic Revolution: From Documentary to Creativity."

Location: Price Auditorium
Speakers: Giovanni Aloi, and gallery tours led by Erica Warren, Lekha Waitoller, and others
Program capacity: 100
Registration period: Wednesday, August 22, 2018 – Tuesday, September 11, 2018

>Schedule of the Day:10:45Lecture in Price Auditorium by Giovanni Aloi2:00

>Gallery Tour – Choose one of the four options below, take an audio tour, or visit the exhibitions on your own.Judy Ledgerwood: Chromatic Patterns for the Art Institute of ChicagoMusic and Movement: Rhythm in Textile DesignNever a Lovely So Real: Photography and Film in Chicago, 1950-1980James Webb: Prayer 2:45

>Gallery Tour – Choose one of the four options below, take an audio tour, or visit the exhibitions on your own.Judy Ledgerwood: Chromatic Patterns for the Art Institute of ChicagoMusic and Movement: Rhythm in Textile DesignNever a Lovely So Real: Photography and Film in Chicago, 1950-1980James Webb: Prayer

This Community Associates event is exclusively for current Community Associates members. Membership will be verified at the door, and refunds cannot be issued for those without a valid membership. For Community Associates events that allow guests, nonmember guests must be registered by a Community Associates member. If you are interested in becoming a member of Community Associates, please visit artic.edu/joinnow to join both the Art Institute of Chicago and the Community Associates group of your choice.
